scripts.say: Hmm, to think that even you would lose... It seems like there really is a limit to using "pieces."
*cough* *cough*... My sincerest apologies...
It doesn't matter. From the beginning, the only purpose you've all served was to buy more time for me while I increased my authorization over the Mirror Sea. In other words, "pieces."
Look around you. The Mirror Seas around us slowly bend to my will, and the pseudo-Singularity that shall serve as a "Gate" between worlds shall open soon!
With this power, repairing "pieces" is a simple task... So what say you? Do you wish to reward the Resistance with one final battle?
Thank you for your consideration... I see now... the authorization is almost complete... Everything has been going according to plan.
Sure. You've bought me the time I needed to clear the authorization, so... Go forth, quickly...
The sound of a surge of electricity was followed by wisps of smoke rising from Tester's body. The Siren collapsed as she lost consciousness.
Everything has been going according to plan... Now, it's time for me to prepare my next move.
Waters surrounding the Hololive HQ
Y'know, I've been through quite a lot, so I thought nothing could surprise me...
But this performance stage...
A performance stage, cobbled together with blocks of various colors, loomed before Zuikaku.
The words "HOLOLIVE" were assembled with large blocks towards the stage's rear.
Though the appearance was quite normal, there was something indescribably threatening about it.
Zed, I want to watch a concerton this stage.
I know nothing about that!
Eh? Do you girls also go to concerts?
W-well, not all of them, but some of them...
"Hololive Stage," huh... Is this where everyone gathers for performances in your world?
This is the new Holo Island Stage that Fubuki made! In any case, it might be a bit unfamiliar to you guys.
Awawawa! This was just... supposed to be a parody! *hides*
(I have a feeling she just barely stopped herself from saying something really controversial...)
Before I came here, I actually wanted to dance on stage with the others. This stage is so cute with all its different colors~
(Miss Sora doesn't get it at all, does she...)
(It's okay, just leave it as it is...)
I got it! In other words, this stage was distorted by the Sirens!
(Zuikaku doesn't get it either...)
(That's fine too!)
